verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:25
verses.text: And Absalom made Amasa captain of the host instead of Joab: which Amasa was a man’s son, whose name was Ithra an Israelite, that went in to Abigail the daughter of Nahash, sister to Zeruiah Joab’s mother.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:26
verses.text: So Israel and Absalom pitched in the land of Gilead.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:27
verses.text: And it came to pass, when David was come to Mahanaim, that Shobi the son of Nahash of Rabbah of the children of Ammon, and Machir the son of Ammiel of Lo–debar, and Barzillai the Gileadite of Rogelim,
